October 29
For anyone who hasn't yet heard the news::

Believe it or not (you better because it's true ;)), twilight killers (#tk) are back together. Jason - very reasonably I think - parted with us to join up with (ex) tk-basic and clon3 to revive tk. As a west coaster and founder of tk, I think he made the best decision.
Good luck to Jason and tk...may plan:b kick your ass at some point! :P
